snippet.title: Forts Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Forts, a physics-based action RTS, challenges players to construct custom bases and destroy their opponents'. The fight for the last of Earth's resources comes to Windows in Q1 2017

Visit us at http: //www.earthworkgames.com

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/earthworkgames

Twitter: https://twitter.com/EarthWorkGames

Tumblr: http://earthworkgames.tumblr.com.
